title: 5 THINGS TO KNOW! Before You Start a New Drawing

---

This is the start of a series of videos that I intend to do, showing you how to draw a small house "From Start To Finish". My hope is that you will learn the fundamentals so that you can apply them to your own projects.

In this first video, I will explain the basic pointers that you must take into consideration before starting a new design. Everything that is said in this video are based on my own experience, having done drawings for numerous clients, in Jamaica.

Thank you all for watching and sharing. 
Give it a like, and subscribe!
